quotes.text: Code is like humor.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.text: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: Programming isn't about what you know.
quotes.author: Andrew Hunt

quotes.text: Code never lies, comments sometimes do.
quotes.author: Ron Jeffries

quotes.text: Weeks of coding can save hours of planning.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.text: Measure twice, cut once.
quotes.author: Traditional

quotes.text: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Every programmer is an author.
quotes.author: Sercan Leylek

quotes.text: Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.text: It's not a bug – it's an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.text: Good code is its own best documentation.
quotes.author: Steve McConnell

quotes.text: Programming is thinking, not typing.
quotes.author: Casey Patton

quotes.text: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Deleted code is debugged code.
quotes.author: Jeff Sickel

quotes.text: Software and cathedrals are much the same.
quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to implement it.
quotes.author: David Heinemeier Hansson

quotes.text: Code is like poetry.
quotes.author: Johnathan Nightingale

quotes.text: Programs must be written for people to read.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.text: Computers are good at following instructions, but not at reading your mind.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.text: Coding is today's language of creativity.
quotes.author: Maria Klawe

quotes.text: Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Confusion is part of programming.
quotes.author: Felienne Hermans

quotes.text: Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan
